title: 来说说命令方块
author: nktdd551
txt_content: 命令方块可以输哪些高科技指令

replies.author: Lucky_fish0w0
replies.txt_content:
execute @e ~ ~ ~ execute @e ~ ~ ~ execute @e ~ ~ ~ summon PrimedTnt
你可以试一试（手动滑稽

replies.author: ItIsEnderman
replies.txt_content: scoreboard指令，很高级，但难得要死

replies.author: 子弹～
replies.txt_content:
许多许多
比如一些NBT

replies.txt_content: 对这些东西我一窍不通
